body:
Hello there!
This might seem like a super random post for most new Avicus players. I was a super obsessed Avicus player back in the good old/MCZone days (feels like years ago now) and for some reason today I felt like checking back on the community I once loved. Here's my leaving 'announcement' for those of you who might remember- https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/69127aff0 . I think I must have been about 16 when I signed off for the last time (yep I did come back once or twice for nostalgia's sake).. now I'm 18 *runs away from adult responsibilities*. Long story short I just wanted to check back and see if any of the old buddies I used to hang around with on Nebula & teamspeak are still here c: Might be a shot in the dark but it would be lovely to hear from anyone that remembers those days. I think I've lost my mojo when it comes to minecraft these days so if you see me messing around on Avicus in a moment.. that'll be why! Love to you all :)
body_tagged:

replies.body:
@remy- AAAAH I REMEMBER YOU OF COURSE :D Oh wow, so nice to see you're still around! 
@99250- defo remember you, so weird how names kinda stick in your head after you see them again :) Haha oh dear, my youtube video's weren't my finest moments C:
@Buster <3 <3 <3 Hey! I'll be adding you in a moment :D Eek so wonderful that we can still get in contact!
@Nip- long long long looong time ago yes! :D yourself too?
@Tigger- thanks m'dear :)
@ Cianna- Heya, can't keep up with all these name changes- feel like I should start keeping a log haha! :D
@Pizza- AAAAH pizza, now there's a name I can remember without having something to jog my memory! I'll find some time to get on ts this weekend if not tonight :D Haha no way!! (I'll keep one eye open ;D)
@AyyJake- aww that's awesome, even if we did just pass eachother while playing! How long ago did you change your IGN? Your new one sounds more familiar :D

If you guys (and anyone who sees this later on) are up for it, we should all have a reunion for old times sake? Thoughts? C:
